Reviews.Title: Not Perfect
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Description said it was a lenovo T42 and I got a t43. Description said there was no issues and I needed to replace the battery because it said if it was 100% charged it said it had 25 minutes left. Not too happy even though I got a new battery for 20 buck.

ProductInfo.Features:
IBM ThinkPad T42
1.70 GHz CPU - Intel Centrino processor
1.5 GB Memory - Upgraded
60 GB Hard Drive - Upgraded
Windows 7 Home Premium Installed and Activated - Upgraded. (Buyer might need to buy Win 7 licence key or downgrade to Windows-xp and use COA sticker in the back)
ProductInfo.Name: IBM Thinkpad T42 15" Windows-7 Laptop Notebook Computer - Excellent Condition
